thread.title: Katara Limousine expands fleet with new Zhongtong 53-seater coach
thread.title_full: Katara Limousine expands fleet with new Zhongtong 53-seater coach

author: Gulf News Report
title: Katara Limousine expands fleet with new Zhongtong 53-seater coach
text:
The new coach reflects the company's focus on safe, stylish, and comfortable travel
Doha, Qatar: Zhongtong delivers its first unit of 53 Seater Super luxury coach to Katara Limousine – one of the top chauffeur service providers in Qatar. This addition reinforces the company’s commitment to offering world-class travel solutions that combine sophistication, comfort, and safety for groups of all sizes.
The new Super Coach is designed to set a benchmark in premium group travel. Equipped with a high-performance Cummins Europe engine and advanced ZF transmission technology, it delivers smooth power, efficiency, and reliability — ensuring long-distance journeys are both seamless and cost-effective. With a maximum speed of 100 km/h and optimised fuel consumption, it meets the growing demand for sustainable, modern, and high-capacity transport across Qatar.
Inside, passengers are treated to a truly luxurious experience. The 53-seat configuration features a 2+2 layout with diamond-stitched reclining seats, armrests, and footrests, providing exceptional comfort for every traveller. Premium air-conditioning with individual vents, double overhead luggage racks, and advanced entertainment systems with dual LCD screens make the coach ideal for tourism groups, corporate delegations, and VIP event transportation.
Safety has been made a top priority. The coach comes equipped with ABS braking, retarder technology, a fire suppression system, tyre pressure monitoring, and a driver fatigue alert system all designed to ensure maximum passenger security. Emergency equipment such as fire extinguishers, safety hammers, and first aid kits adds further peace of mind.
With sleek exterior styling, full LED lighting, and luxurious interior finishes, the ZHONGTONG Super Coach blends elegance with practicality. It is perfectly suited to serve Qatar’s booming tourism industry, high-profile events, and large-scale corporate transport needs. All these make it a wise choice for chauffeur service in Qatar or group travel.
By introducing the state-of-the-art 53-Seater Super Luxury Coach, Katara Limousine strengthens its position as Qatar’s leading limousine and luxury transport provider while supporting the nation’s vision of world-class hospitality and sustainable mobility.
Whether for bus rental in Qatar or premium chauffeur service, this launch highlights Katara Limousine’s dedication to redefining group travel. As Qatar continues to host major international events and welcome global visitors, this next-generation coach sets a new benchmark for group travel with its unmatched blend of comfort, efficiency, and safety, redefining premium transportation experiences across the region.
